settings.heading: Custom Block
settings.text:
Custom CMS block displayed at the left sidebar on the Catalog Page. Put your own content here: text, html, images, media... or whatever you like.

There are many similar sample content placeholders across the store. All editable from admin panel.

It might look like weak willpower, but itâ€™s really your body working against youğŸ¤¯. Stress lowers serotonin, making your mood fragile and your brain desperate for the comfort of high-calorie foodğŸ”. Carb-heavy meals spike your blood sugar and then drop it sharply, amplifying hunger and cravings, trapping you in a â€œcontrolâ€“indulgeâ€“regretâ€ cycleğŸ«£. The way out is to steady both mood and blood sugarâš–ï¸.
